'''1.7.1''' is a hotfix to {{el|be}} released exclusively for Windows 10 and Xbox One on November 7, 2018, which fixes bugs that occurred on those platforms.<ref name='1.7.1'>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360019026771-Minecraft-1-7-1-Bedrock-|title=Minecraft - 1.7.1 (Bedrock)|date=November 7, 2018}}</ref> This version is compatible with 1.7.0 servers.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed several crashes that occurred during gameplay
* Fixed a crash that occurred when attempting to launch Code Connection with Minecraft for Windows 10
